# Third Party Libraries

# Introduction

Please be aware of some of the libraries are proprietary and you have to own a license
to use them for commercial usage (depending on license type).


## Client

 - Armadillo/SoftwarePassport (N/A, Proprietary)
 - [Boost](https://www.boost.org/) (Boost Software License)
 - [Crypto++](https://cryptopp.com/) (Boost Software License)
 - [DevIL](http://openil.sourceforge.net/) (LGPL v2)
 - DirectX (N/A, N/A)
 - [GameGuard](https://gameguard.nprotect.com/en/index.html) (proprietary)
 - [Granny3D](http://www.radgametools.com/granny.html) (Proprietary)
 - HackShield (N/A, Proprietary)
 - [libjpeg](https://github.com/winlibs/libjpeg) (Mixed IJG, BSD and zlib)
 - [LZO](https://www.oberhumer.com/opensource/lzo/) (GPL v2+)
 - [Python](https://www.python.org/) (Special License)
 - [SpeedTree](https://store.speedtree.com/) (Proprietary)
 - [Themida](https://www.oreans.com/themida.php) (Proprietary)
 - [The Miles Sound System](http://www.radgametools.com/miles.htm) (Proprietary)
 - Unicows (N/A, N/A)
 - XTrap (N/A, Proprietary)


## Server

 - [Boost](https://www.boost.org/) (N/A, Boost Software License)
 - [Crypto++](https://cryptopp.com/) (N/A, Boost Software License)
 - [DevIL](http://openil.sourceforge.net/) (N/A, LGPL v2)
 - HackShield (N/A, Proprietary)
 - [LibMySQL](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/c-api/) (N/A, GPL v2)
 - XTrap (N/A, Proprietary)
